Hiya Jain

about / now / twitter

Hi, I'm Hiya! I grew up in India, but am now a NYC local, studying neuroscience at Fordham.

I care deeply about the intersection of technology and mental health, and I'm passionate about using technology to help people. I'm currently working on a project called Mental Health Hackathon, which aims to bring together students from all over the world to create mental health solutions. I'm also a member of the Fordham Psychology Research Lab, where I'm working on a project that aims to use machine learning to predict the onset of depression in college students.

In the past, I spent a semester at SciencesPo Reims, where I studied economics and policy. I was also in San Francisco working at Transcend Network, a network for people trying to build something new in the world of education.
